languages.text: "Ты одержала славную победу — позволь я отворю кровь на шрамах твоих, дабы боль укрепила тебя для грядущих битв".
languages.translation_comment:
Speaker Kibellah
Argenta: "Praying before the Sacred Warrant has imbued me with the determination to fulfil my mission... With the support of the Rogue Trader, I will wrest the relic from the heretics' clutches!"

languages.text: "You have won a glorious victory — allow me to let the blood from your scars, so that the pain may strengthen you for the battles to come."
languages.original_text: "Ты одержала славную победу — позволь я отворю кровь на шрамах твоих, дабы боль укрепила тебя для грядущих битв".

traits.locale_text: "You have won a glorious victory — allow me to let the blood from your scars, so that the pain may strengthen you for the battles to come."
"You have won a glorious victory — allow me to let the blood from your scars, so that the pain may strengthen you for the battles to come."
"You have won a glorious victory — allow me to let the blood from your scars, so that the pain may strengthen you for the battles to come."
"You have won a glorious victory — allow me to let the blood from your scars, so that the pain may strengthen you for the battles to come."
"You have won a glorious victory — allow me to let the blood from your scars, so that the pain may strengthen you for the battles to come."

languages.text: "Ihr habt einen glorreichen Sieg errungen. Gestattet mir, das Blut aus Euren Wunden abzulassen, auf dass der Schmerz Euch für die kommenden Schlachten stärke."
languages.original_text: "You have won a glorious victory — allow me to let the blood from your scars, so that the pain may strengthen you for the battles to come."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt einen glorreichen Sieg errungen. Gestattet mir, das Blut aus Euren Wunden abzulassen, auf dass der Schmerz Euch für die kommenden Schlachten stärke."

languages.text: « Vous avez remporté une glorieuse victoire... Permettez que je fasse couler le sang de vos cicatrices, que la douleur vous galvanise pour les combats à venir. »
languages.original_text: "You have won a glorious victory — allow me to let the blood from your scars, so that the pain may strengthen you for the battles to come."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez remporté une glorieuse victoire... Permettez que je fasse couler le sang de vos cicatrices, que la douleur vous galvanise pour les combats à venir. »

languages.text: «Ha ganado una victoria gloriosa. Permítame que haga fluir la sangre de sus heridas, para que el dolor le dé fuerzas en las batallas venideras».
languages.original_text: "You have won a glorious victory — allow me to let the blood from your scars, so that the pain may strengthen you for the battles to come."

traits.locale_text: «Ha ganado una victoria gloriosa. Permítame que haga fluir la sangre de sus heridas, para que el dolor le dé fuerzas en las batallas venideras».

languages.text: 「お前は輝かしく勝利をしたんだ。その傷跡から血を流させてほしい。その痛みが、これからの戦いの為にお前を強くするのだ」
languages.original_text: "You have won a glorious victory — allow me to let the blood from your scars, so that the pain may strengthen you for the battles to come."

traits.locale_text: 「お前は輝かしく勝利をしたんだ。その傷跡から血を流させてほしい。その痛みが、これからの戦いの為にお前を強くするのだ」

languages.text: “你赢得了一场光荣的胜利，请允许我为你的伤疤放血。这样一来，你的痛苦就会让你在未来的战斗中更加坚强。”
languages.original_text: "You have won a glorious victory — allow me to let the blood from your scars, so that the pain may strengthen you for the battles to come."

traits.locale_text: “你赢得了一场光荣的胜利，请允许我为你的伤疤放血。这样一来，你的痛苦就会让你在未来的战斗中更加坚强。”

languages.original_text: "You have won a glorious victory — allow me to let the blood from your scars, so that the pain may strengthen you for the battles to come."

languages.text: "Şanlı bir zafer kazandın. Bırak yaraların kanasın. Bu sayede hissedeceğin tüm acılar, önündeki çatışmalarda sana güç verir."
languages.original_text: "You have won a glorious victory — allow me to let the blood from your scars, so that the pain may strengthen you for the battles to come."
